issue.title: gui: Hide file pull order when folder is send only

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

issue.body:
Fixes issue #6807 

### Testing

As stated by the below article, update default gui folder. Then run syncthing and setup new folder or edit existing folder, go to the Advanced tab and chage "Folder Type" to "Send Only" and observe "File Pull Order" is hidden.  
https://docs.syncthing.net/dev/web.html# 

NB: May need to force refresh to ensure html page isn't cached. 

### Screenshots

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7538671/86540653-dbfd4280-befe-11ea-905c-45c8e861d41f.png)

issue.title: gui: Disable file pull order when for send-only (fixes #6807)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

issue.body:
Fixes issue #6807

### Testing

As stated by the below article, update default gui folder. Then run syncthing and setup new folder or edit existing folder, go to the Advanced tab and chage "Folder Type" to "Send Only" and observe "File Pull Order" is set to disabled.  
https://docs.syncthing.net/dev/web.html# 

NB: May need to force refresh to ensure html page isn't cached. 

### Screenshots

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7538671/86968739-92ae2c80-c164-11ea-80c7-bb276ca7df8b.png)

body:
The issue has been marked fixed, but I have just noticed that the "File Pull Order" is still shown in the GUI for "Send Only" folders, after unfolding the folder's details. This only happens when it has been set to a non-default value before setting the folder type to "Send Only".

I think that it should be hidden here too.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5626656/89048861-5ea4e080-d38b-11ea-9d77-e7e9ec95662d.png)

issue.title: gui: Don't show pull order on SO folders (ref #6807)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

milestone.title: v1.9.0
milestone.description: This release adds the advanced folder option `caseSensitiveFS` (https://docs.syncthing.net/advanced/folder-caseSensitiveFS.html) to disable the new safe handling of case insensitive filesystems.

issue.body:
### Purpose

https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/issues/6807#issuecomment-667172474:
> [...] I have just noticed that the "File Pull Order" is still shown in the GUI for "Send Only" folders, after unfolding the folder's details. This only happens when it has been set to a non-default value before setting the folder type to "Send Only".
> 
> I think that it should be hidden here too.

### Testing

Didn't test.
